-- | Straight implementation of mustache templates
--   
--   Straight implementation of mustache templates
@package mustache-haskell
@version 0.1.0.5

module Text.Mustache.Types
data Chunk
Var :: KeyPath -> Chunk
UnescapedVar :: KeyPath -> Chunk
Section :: KeyPath -> [Chunk] -> (Maybe Text) -> Chunk
InvertedSection :: KeyPath -> [Chunk] -> Chunk
SetDelimiter :: String -> String -> Chunk
Plain :: Text -> Chunk
Partial :: FilePath -> Chunk
Comment :: Text -> Chunk
type KeyPath = [Key]
data Key
Key :: Text -> Key
Index :: Int -> Key
instance Eq Key
instance Show Key
instance Read Key
instance Show Chunk
instance Read Chunk
instance Eq Chunk

module Text.Mustache

-- | Evaluation functions
runTemplate :: [Chunk] -> Value -> Builder
runParse :: String -> [Chunk]
readTemplate :: String -> IO [Chunk]
